"The Equalizer" is a 2014 action thriller film directed by David Fincher and starring Denzel Washington, Chloë Grace Moretz, James Wilcox, and Hope Davis. 

The film follows Jack McCall (Denzel Washington), an former CIA operative who now works freelance as an assassin, who is hired by the daughter of Russian mobster Ivan Rostov (James Wilcox)) to kill her father, while being pursued by two police detectives (Hope Davis) who are trying to bring McCall and his client to justice.
